answers.answer: Not at all. Unless they give you a reason to be. I had to deliver a month early with my first because I was eclamptic. They might be nervous the baby will be too big. Don't stress baby will be find.
I wouldn't be scared. Did your Dr tell you the reasons behind the decision?
Not at all! I just had my baby boy in April at 37 weeks because of Gestational hypertension. Dr was worried because I got it at 27weeks and she didn't want it to turn to preeclampsia.

question: Should I be s little nervous if my doctor wants to deliver me at 37 weeks
title: should I be scared
